name: Vibrant Actions
description:
The world is your oyster, not your trash can!

A visit to your favorite seashore takes a disastrous turn when you realize that what was once an unadulterated stretch of golden coastline has become a dumping ground for tourists and frequent beachgoers alike, now trash-laden and devoid of color. 

Explore and clean the beach up in this casual first-person walking simulator using simple point-and-click controls to help restore its natural vibrance and beauty.

Learning through play

Originally made to raise environmental awareness and encourage learning about responsible waste management, players are shown the impact humanity has had on a virtual habitat and are invited to play a part in reversing the damage done. The aim is to inspire players to employ in real life the lessons being conveyed through gameplay.

Volume up!

Vibrant Actions is best played with sound.

Made by a team that loves pristine coastlines
